name: Cyberspace: Electrica
description:
Created for the Amaze Me Game Jam

Cyberspace Electrica is an arcade-style space shooter. The game features basic ship customization with multiple difficulty levels, and different mechanics to suit your playstyle, plus a few other mechanics that harken back to classic arcade space shooter games.

Thank you for checking it out, and I hope you enjoy.

Credits:

Fonts are from https://backpacker.gr/fonts/ & https://www.dafont.com/george-triantafyllakos.d1813

Synthesizers: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ja1CzMsmjPA

Tools used for Sound Effects & Music Creation: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone & www.beepbox.co
